Docs.summary: Base class for SceneKit geometry objects

remarks.para: All geometry in SceneKit is described by subclasses of :

item.description: A pill-shaped capsule with adjustable end caps
A cone whose top can be truncated
An infinite plane with the ability to reflect the geometry above it.
A 2D shape that has been extruded into the 3rd dimension.

remarks.para: Subclasses are typically instantiated with a static Create factory method rather than a constructor.
In addition, SceneKit can load entire scenes from .DAE files with the M:SceneKit.SCNScene.FromFile* method.
